module.display: Driver|Power|${module.driver.lpmv2.name} S5D9 Low Power Mode Standby on r_lpmv2

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.display: Output port state in standby and deep standby, applies to address output, data output, and other bus control output pins

module.declarations: /************************************************************/ /** Begin LPM V2 Configurations *****************************/ /************************************************************/ #if defined(BSP_MCU_GROUP_S5D9) const lpmv2_mcu_cfg_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_mcu_cfg = { .standby_wake_sources = (lpmv2_standby_wake_source_bits_t)${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ0} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ1} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ2} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ3} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ4} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ5} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ6} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ7} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ8} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ9} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ10} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ11} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ12} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ13} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ14} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IRQ15} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_iwdt} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_key} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_lvd1} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_lvd2} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_ACMPHS0} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_RTCALM} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_RTCPRD} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_USBHS} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_USBFS} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_AGT1UD} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_AGT1CA} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_AGT1CB} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.standby_wake_IIC0}, .snooze_request_source = ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_request}, .snooze_end_sources = (lpmv2_snooze_end_bits_t)${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_agt1_underflow} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_dtc_complete} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_dtc_complete_negated} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_adc0_compare_match} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_adc0_compare_mismatch} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_adc1_compare_match} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_adc1_compare_mismatch} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_end_sci0_compare_mismatch}, .dtc_state_in_snooze = ${module.driver.lpmv2.snooze_dtc}, .output_port_enable = ${module.driver.lpmv2.output_port_enable_standby}, .io_port_state = LPMV2_IO_PORT_NO_CHANGE, .power_supply_state = LPMV2_POWER_SUPPLY_DEEPCUT0, .deep_standby_cancel_source = (lpmv2_deep_standby_cancel_source_bits_t)LPMV2_DEEP_STANDBY_CANCEL_SOURCE_RESET_ONLY, .deep_standby_cancel_edge = (lpmv2_deep_standby_cancel_edge_bits_t)LPMV2_DEEP_STANDBY_CANCEL_SOURCE_EDGE_NONE, }; const lpmv2_cfg_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_cfg = { .low_power_mode = ${module.driver.lpmv2.low_power_mode}, .p_extend = &${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_mcu_cfg, }; const lpmv2_instance_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name} = { .p_api = &g_lpmv2_on_lpmv2, .p_cfg = &${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_cfg }; #endif /************************************************************/ /** End LPM V2 Configurations *******************************/ /************************************************************/

module.display: Driver|Power|${module.driver.lpmv2.name} S5D9 Low Power Mode Deep Standby on r_lpmv2

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance

property.display: Output port state in standby and deep standby, applies to address output, data output, and other bus control output pins
Maintain or reset the IO port states on exit from deep standby mode
Internal power supply control in deep standby mode

option.display: Cut the power supply to standby RAM, low-speed on-chip oscillator, AGTn, and USBFS/HS resume detecting unit
Cut the power supply to LVDn, standby RAM, low-speed on-chip oscillator, AGTn, and USBFS/HS resume detecting unit

module.declarations: /************************************************************/ /** Begin LPM V2 Configurations *****************************/ /************************************************************/ #if defined(BSP_MCU_GROUP_S5D9) const lpmv2_mcu_cfg_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_mcu_cfg = { .standby_wake_sources = (lpmv2_standby_wake_source_bits_t)0, .snooze_end_sources = (lpmv2_snooze_end_bits_t)LPMV2_SNOOZE_END_STANDBY_WAKE_SOURCES, .dtc_state_in_snooze = LPMV2_SNOOZE_DTC_DISABLE, .output_port_enable = ${module.driver.lpmv2.output_port_enable_standby}, .io_port_state = ${module.driver.lpmv2.io_port_deep_standby_exit}, .power_supply_state = ${module.driver.lpmv2.power_supply_deep_standby}, .deep_standby_cancel_source = (lpmv2_deep_standby_cancel_source_bits_t)${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ0} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ1} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ2} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ3} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ4} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ5} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ6} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ7} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ8} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ9} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ10} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ11} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ12} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ13} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ14} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ15} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_LVD1} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_LVD2} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_RTC_INTERVAL} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_NMI} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_USBFS} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_USBHS} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_AGT1}, .deep_standby_cancel_edge = (lpmv2_deep_standby_cancel_edge_bits_t)${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ0_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ1_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ2_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ3_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ4_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ5_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ6_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ7_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ8_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ9_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ10_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ11_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ12_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ13_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ14_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_IRQ15_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_LVD1_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_LVD2_edge} | ${module.driver.lpmv2.deep_standby_cancel_NMI_edge}, }; const lpmv2_cfg_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_cfg = { .low_power_mode = LPMV2_LOW_POWER_MODE_DEEP, .p_extend = &${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_mcu_cfg, }; const lpmv2_instance_t ${module.driver.lpmv2.name} = { .p_api = &g_lpmv2_on_lpmv2, .p_cfg = &${module.driver.lpmv2.name}_cfg }; #endif /************************************************************/ /** End LPM V2 Configurations *******************************/ /************************************************************/
